text: Ludwig van Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 15 in D major, also called Pastoral or Pastorale, Op. 28, is a piece of music for solo piano. It was written and published in 1801. The sonata was dedicated to count Joseph von Sonnenfels.Tovey, D.F. (1931) Commentary on Beethoven's Piano Sonatas, London, ABRSM.Ball, P. (2010) The Music Instinct, London, The Bodley Head The sonata is approximately 23-24 minutes long. ==Form== The sonata is in four movements: ==References== Category:Compositions in D major Piano Sonata 015
title: Piano Sonata No. 15 (Beethoven)
